comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:9.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/9.0

The page-switching circles easily become broken for me.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Have one or more apps installed.
2. Cause existence of 3 or more pages (e.g. by dragging the app's icon to them).
3. Click one of the circles which represent pages, then click a different one before the page display is stabilized. Repeat until reproduced.

Results:
* Clicking a circle doesn't show the right page (or maybe doesn't show the page right).
* Switching pages by dragging works properly and probably fixes the breakage.
comments.creator: deletesoftware+moz@yandex.ru
